name: Return To Monke 2
description:
In this game you are a Monke, and you have to find all of the banana trees. Will you be able to find all of the banana trees?

This game is a remake of one of my earlier jam games, the game is called Return To Monke: https://pxldev.itch.io/return-to-monke

Controlls Movement W, A, S, D and arrow keys. Friday Night Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 3 hours. The 3-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

All of the assets were made during the time of the jam by me.
